title: SOLD Ty Cobb Red Portrait SC350 SGC 1.5

posts.post_title: SOLD Ty Cobb Red Portrait SC350 SGC 1.5
posts.post_content:
For sale is this T206 Ty Cobb red portrait Sweet Caporal 350 SGC 1.5

Red background is still extremely bright and the centering is nearly perfect. Obvious crease through the center, but it does not go through his head and is otherwise a very good looking card. 

SOLD. Shipping included.

If you have any questions, let me know!
PRICE REDUCED! Grab this beauty now before it's gone!!
